title: Explorer
desc: Explorer is a traveller's guide/search engine to find your next travel location. It provides information about cities and provides suggestions depending on the user type.

title: Natocrypt
desc: Natocrypt is a zero dependency NPM encryption library. Users can either use the NATO Phonetic Alphabet to encrypt their passwords/text or apply encryption using the Morse Code.

title: Techbook
desc: Techbook allows people from the Tech industry to connect with each other, gives recruiters the ability to connect and interact with people, enables students to improve their work.

title: Skewed News
desc: This is an interactive news application that displays several news sources depending on their category. It also includes many other features like, currency conversion, daily BTC value and much more.

title: Meteor Rush
desc: This is an arcade-style, space shooter game created with Scratch.

title: Tech Connect
desc: This website is a CMS-style blog site similar to a WordPress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developers posts as well.

title: EXP | CON
desc: This is a front-end only application created as a prototype.

title: Skydia
desc: Skydia is a simple front-end weather application that allows users to view the weather of a searched city. Users can acces their favourite cities as well.

title: Zion API
desc: Zion is a movie theater API which allows user to configure their movies, rooms and showtimes.

title: whit3-wall3t
desc: Whit3 wall3t is an easy & efficient way to keep track of your budget. It allows users to access their wallet even when there is no internet connection, it also can be installed through the browser and used on your phone & desktop.

title: Fit Track
desc: Fit Track allows users to achieve their fitness goals more quickly by keeping track of their workout progress. Users can view, create and track their daily workouts as well as, logging multiple workouts on a given day.

title: Auto Committer
desc: This is a shell script application which allows the user to add, commit and push to a github repo with just a single command.

title: p0ck3t
desc: This GUI was created to store and organize your passwords.

title: Remember Me
desc: This is a simple Note Taker app that allows users to add, edit and delete notes.

title: Buy M3
desc: This API was created to perform CRUD operations on the simple elements that can occur on a standard E-Commerce project.

title: E-Tracker
desc: This API was created to organize and plan businesses, it allows the user to easily store data about their employee's, departments and roles.

title: Team Builder
desc: This is a software engineering team generator application that creates new members depending on their position in the team. It can generate an infinite amount of members while still maintaining the structure of the HTML webpage its being displayed.

title: Fog City
desc: This weather dashboard was created to display the current weather conditions and the upcoming weather forecast of five days.

title: No Stress
desc: This is a daily work scheduler to organize and plan out the events during the day.

title: 60 Seconds Challenge
desc: This coding quiz has 8 questions with a timer of 60 seconds. Every incorrect answer will cost -10 seconds in the timer, the score will be stored, and multiple attempts are allowed.

title: Unhackable
desc: This is my first application created using JavaScript. It generates a password depending on the criteria the user chooses.

title: The List
desc: This list was created to organize your daily tasks.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
desc: This rock-paper-scissors game was created only with alerts, prompts and confirm methods.

title: KD Portfolio
desc: This is my first, fully responsive portfolio.
